channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [OOZIE-2440] Exponential re-try policy for workflow action
item.description: Currently the user can mention retry interval and maximum number of retries. We will add another element in action tag through which the user can mention policy for the retry. Policy could be exponential or periodic. Periodic will be the default as it is the current policy.
item.summary: Exponential re-try policy for workflow action

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:

Please review
